skills.name: RUIN
desc: • Deals true damage to a single target.
• Remove up to 2 Beneficial Effects if the target has Immunity.
• Damage increases based on your DEF and MAX HP.

skills.name: REFRESHING WIND
desc: • Heal amount is based on your ATTACK and MAX HP.
• Increase DEF and MR of allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: TOMB OF HORUS
desc: • Deals true damage to all enemies.
• Stun and Curse a random enemy for 2 turns.
